doc.field: Series I. Early life and Moffitt family
Series I. Early life and Moffitt family
Copy of birth certificate issued by County of Los Angeles Registrar-Recorder/County Clerk
Copy of birth certificate issued by County of Los Angeles Registrar-Recorder/County Clerk

Contains a copy requested in 2006 of BJK's birth certificate and affidavit to correct original birth certificate's error in spelling Billie Jean King's middle name as "Jaan" on original certificate. The date of original birth certificate document (not included in folder) is November 22, 1943, and the date of original affidavit for correction document (not included in folder) is May 11, 1955.
